featured.text: When the shuttle touches the land, a drag parachute opens to steady the aircraft, get the speed right, and help the brakes on the landing-gear wheels to bring it to a complete stop. 49.

definition.zh_def: 齒輪；裝置或設備，通常用於機械或運動中。
definition.en_def: A mechanism or device that transmits motion or power, often consisting of toothed wheels.
definition.example: She shifted into a higher gear to speed up the car.
